caption:
This image captures an indoor setting in an office-like environment, notable for its striking black and white checkered floor. In the foreground, an individual, seated at a desk, is seen from an elevated, overhead perspective. The person, whose gender isn't clearly identifiable from this angle, appears to be engaged in writing or drawing on papers, with a pen in hand.

The desk is equipped with a sizable, early-model computer or typewriter, featuring a large keyboard array. Additional papers and a small personal item, possibly a watch or small device, rest atop the table.

Behind the person, the room extends into two open areas separated by a partially visible partition. A door to the side stands ajar, reflecting a subtle pink light which intriguingly contrasts the predominantly cool, bluish lighting of the setting. A peek into the adjacent section reveals another desk equipped with a chair, though it seems unoccupied at this moment.

The atmosphere exudes a somewhat dated, retro ambiance, emphasized by the type of office equipment and furnishings visible. The overall mood is somewhat solitary and focused, possibly in a research or administrative office where detailed tasks are performed. The environment appears to be quiet, suggesting either early morning hours or a late-night working scenario.
title: Laboratory at epa's Las Vegas national research center
